name: Friday Night Funkin': VS. Bogus
description:
Friday Night Funkin': VS. Bogus

A Friday Night Funkin' Mod

Boyfriend and Girlfriend are out on a date until a gigantic Redditor picks them up, where they're forced to battle... a normal sized Redditor. Still quite a heckin' chonker, am I right? Wholesome 100!!! (gags) He wants your girl, but you won't let him take her... right?

Play against Bogus the Redditor in a zany full week, featuring 3D rendered cutscenes, a bangin' soundtrack, and a quite a few extra goodies!

Credits:

Cally3D: Project leader, artist, animator

ThisIsBennyK: Programmer

DodZonedOut: Musician

McDoodle275: Voice acting

Sayge3D: Charting
